About

Curriculum Vitae available Here.

Over 16 years of experience in many areas of communication, I have developed a variety of skills. At the age of 23, I participated in the implementation of a daily newspaper in the region of Concordia, in the west of Santa Catarina, where I worked until its consolidation as one of the main communication vehicles of that region. I have published more than a thousand articles and photos as a reporter in various publications. More than a decade ago I began to direct my studies to digital media by the growing influence on opinion formation and consumer profile.

Career

  • February 2015 to October 2017

    Communication management of the Santa Catarina Department of Agriculture and Fisheries. Responsible for production of content for different media. Relationship with media. Proactive actions next to the media structure. Measure the work, showing consistent information and detailed analysis.

  • April 2014 to December 2014

    Communication adviser during the 2014 election campaign. Responsible for the candidate's advice, content production and communication management. Among the main results obtained is the establishment of a great bond with the voters, mainly in the social networks, increasing the base of votes of the candidate, elected for the legislature 2015/2018.

  • January 2010 to November 2013

    Responsible for the contents of the newspaper, coordinating all stages of production and editing. I led a team of five journalists and two designers and together we gave the newspaper a new face, conquered new readers and subscribers for the company, strengthened the newspaper's link with the community and also received some prizes among the Santa Catarina's newspapers.

  • July 2011 - May 2012

    Vix ne omnesque interpretaris, per ut menandri tincidunt conclusionemque. Sit te simul clita, et vis dicant probatus honestatis
